APPEARANCE.name: AEU-09Y812 AEU Enact Ali Al-Saachez Custom
AEU-09Y812/A Saachez Sen`you AEU Enact Custom (Agrissa-gata)
MSJ-06II-C/B Tieren High Mobility Type B
SVMS-01E Graham Sen`you Union Flag Custom
SVMS-01E Graham Sen`you Union Flag Custom (Over Flags Shiyou)
SVMS-01SG Union Flag Rikusen Juu Soukou-gata (Shell Flag)
SVMS-01X Union Flag Custom II [GN Flag]

description:
By 2307 AD, fossil fuels had already long become virtually exhausted. Humankind spent several decades on wars around the little that remained of such fuels and on constructing a large-scale system to draw in solar power from orbit, with an orbital ring, power microwaving technology, and three orbital elevators. In order to construct such a gigantic, resource-intensive system, however, most relevant countries had consolidated into three major power blocks: the http://anidb.net/ch8593 [World Economic Union], centered around the United States of America; the http://anidb.net/ch8594 [Advanced European Union], centered around the European Union; and the http://anidb.net/ch8592 [Human Reform League], centered around Russia, India and China. As only these power blocs and their allies had participated in the construction of the solar power system, only they were entitled to its benefits; with fossil fuels nearing extinction, countries with economies based on them, such as those from the Middle East, became progressively poorer.
Meanwhile, these three superpowers continued to intervene militarily where they see fit, terrorism was still rampant, and peace was a faraway dream for many people. Even in the 24th century, humankind was far from unified. And even though humans insisted in not learning about the horrors of war and did not make a point of pursuing peace, they still intended to venture away from the Earth, with colonies having been built and nanomachines already allowing for decent life conditions even during prolonged periods in space.
In this still disgracefully conflict-ridden world, a private paramilitary organization unveils its existence, announcing its intention to bring forth the eradication of war and conflict through force of arms. This organization, called http://anidb.net/ch2214 [Celestial Being], possesses its own mobile suits, the Gundams, which are much more powerful than those in the hands of any military in the world, and proceeds to using them to intervene in conflicts in order to stop them by force. Their actions quickly divide public opinion, and governments and other groups begin to act by taking their existence into consideration, but will they manage to bring peace to the world? Beyond the question of how the world will reply immediately, what is going to happen in the future as a result of their actions?
— written by Hinoe

REGULAR.description:
At a military testing ground near its orbital elevator, the AEU is conducting a demonstration of its new Enact mobile suit. Among the audience are ace pilot Graham Aker and engineer Billy Katagiri of the Union forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ソレスタルビーイング

REGULAR.description:
As the world reacts with confusion to Celestial Being`s announcement, the Gundam Meisters prepare for a second mission which will clarify their intentions. While Allelujah and Tieria descend from space, Setsuna and Lockon make contact with the Celestial Being agent Wang Liu-Mei, and all four Gundam Meisters then join forces for an armed intervention on the island of Ceylon.
Source: crunchyroll

The Union ace pilot Graham Aker confronts Setsuna as he leaves Ceylon. Graham`s Union Flag mobile suit proves to be no match for Setsuna`s Gundam, but he returns from battle to learn that he and Billy Katagiri have been reassigned to a new anti-Gundam investigative taskforce.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: โลกที่เปลี่ยนไป

REGULAR.description:
The Human Reform League holds a memorial service for the soldiers whose lives were lost in the recent interventions, and reaffirms its opposition to Celestial Being. Sergei Smirnov is placed in command of a new team whose mission is to eliminate the Gundams.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การเจรจาระดับชาติ

REGULAR.description:
Princess Marina leaves Azadistan and begins a worldwide diplomatic tour to seek help for her impoverished nation. Meanwhile, Kinue Crossroad`s younger brother Saji travels into space via the Human Reform League`s orbital elevator for an educational study tour.
Source: crunchyroll

Celestial Being`s activities have reduced the level of conflict in the world, but there are some who do not welcome this change. Among them is the southern European nation of Moralia, whose economy is based on the arms industry and on private military companies (PMCs).
Source: crunchyroll

During Celestial Being`s intervention in Moralia, Setsuna has been reunited with a figure from his past. His opponent is the mercenary soldier Ali al-Saachez, the same man who once trained Setsuna as a child soldier. Recklessly, Setsuna opens his Gundam`s cockpit to confirm his enemy`s identity.
Source: crunchyroll

An international terror network has begun a campaign of bombing attacks in order to force Celestial Being to halt its armed interventions. While Wang Liu-Mei and Celestial Being`s other agents investigate this network, the Ptolemaios crew watch anxiously from the sidelines, and the Gundam Meisters are placed on standby to respond to new attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

Four months have now passed since Celestial Being began its armed interventions. The initial chaos has subsided, and life goes on. Louise Halevy`s mother visits Tokyo to urge her daughter to come home to Spain, Kinue Crossroad continues her investigation of the mysterious Aeolia Schenberg, and United Nations ambassador Alejandro Corner promises to aid Azadistan by connecting it to the solar power network
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Honor of a Great Power

REGULAR.description:
In Earth orbit, Sergei`s mobile suit team continues its attack on the Ptolemaios and the Gundam Meisters. While Setsuna and Lockon defend their mothership, Allelujah and Tieria find themselves caught in the enemy`s trap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガンダム鹵獲(ろかく)作戦

REGULAR.description:
In the aftermath of the orbital battle, the Human Reform League`s scientists realize that one of the Gundam Meisters is actually a former test subject of their own Superhuman Institute. Allelujah, meanwhile, has learned that the institute is still in operation.
Source: crunchyroll

Although Princess Marina has secured assistance from the United Nations for her troubled homeland, the Kingdom of Azadistan is still in turmoil. A dispute over the introduction of solar power has brought the country`s conservative and reformist factions to the brink of civil war.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To the Limits of Holy Teachings

REGULAR.description:
Setsuna`s actions have prevented a coup d`etat in the Kingdom of Azadistan, but the conservative leader Massoud Rachmadi remains missing, and the situation continues to worsen. In order to find out who is behind the crisis, Setsuna visits the site of the solar antenna facility, where he encounters the Union ace pilot Graham Aker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การกลับมาของนักบุญ

REGULAR.description:
The three superpower blocs begin planning a massive joint military exercise which will serve as a challenge to Celestial Being. Although they recognize this as an obvious trap, the Gundam Meisters have no choice but to respond with an armed intervention, and the Ptolemaios crew descend to Earth to supervise this dangerous mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: รุ่งอรุณแห่งการตัดสินใจ

REGULAR.description:
The Union, Human Reform League, and AEU begin their joint military exercise in the Taklamakan Desert. A nearby uranium storage facility has been left undefended as bait for terrorists, and when Celestial Being intervenes to defend the facility, the combined armies of the three superpower blocs attack the Gundams with overwhelming force.
Source: crunchyroll

On the brink of defeat, the Gundam Meisters have been rescued by the intervention of Celestial Being`s second team. Their rescuers identify themselves as Johann, Michael, and Nena Trinity, the Meisters of the mysterious Gundam Thrones.
Source: crunchyroll

The Ptolemaios crew return to space for a rendezvous with Team Trinity. When they finally meet the new Gundam Meisters face to face, Setsuna and his comrades are disturbed by their attitude and behavior.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Trinity continues its campaign of armed intervention. Unlike Setsuna and his comrades, they are targeting military facilities of all kinds and exterminating everyone on the scene, even civilians.
Source: crunchyroll

Having determined that Team Trinity itself is promoting conflict, Setsuna confronts the Gundam Thrones. Tieria comes to his assistance, and the two Gundam Meisters fight as a team for the first time.
Source: crunchyroll

A mysterious benefactor has provided the three superpower blocs with a new weapon against the Gundams. Quickly establishing a military alliance, the superpowers organize an elite fighting force under the aegis of the United Nations.
Source: crunchyroll

The United Nations forces have deployed their new weapon, a mobile suit model known as the GN-X which is powered by a pseudo solar reactor. While Sergei Smirnov and Soma Peries lead a GN-X team in pursuit of the Gundam Thrones, another force made up of Union and AEU pilots attacks the Ptolemaios in space.
Source: crunchyroll

The United Nations reveals the existence of the GN-X to the world, and announces the launch of a Gundam elimination operation with the code name "Fallen Angels." The operation begins with the renewed pursuit of Team Trinity, who have been forced to abandon their supply base and can now only flee before the enemy`s superior numbers.
Source: crunchyroll

Alejandro Corner and Ribbons Almark have forced their way into the heart of Veda and taken control of Celestial Being`s master computer. But their actions have triggered an unexpected programmed response.
Source: crunchyroll

Despite the loss of Lockon, the Ptolemaios crew are united in their determination to keep fighting the United Nations forces. The enemy begins another assault, this time spearheaded by the Alvatore, a giant mobile armor operated by the traitor Alejandro Corner.
Source: crunchyroll

The Celestial Being mothership Ptolemaios has been destroyed, and most of the Gundams are damaged beyond repair. Yet Setsuna continues his desperate fight against the overwhelming power of Alejandro Corner`s mobile armor and the final weapon hidden within it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 第1話先行試写会レポート

titles.title: โมบิลสูทกันดั้ม ดับเบิ้ลโอ
機動戦士ガンダム MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM 00[ダブルオー]
